highlights.label: KNOW-HOW RETENTION
highlights.text: Secured internal Mock-Up knowledge by recovering, documenting, and transferring critical technical data between outsourced teams

highlights.label: ILS DATA SYNERGY
highlights.text: Optimized ILS data delivery for 3 aircraft programs (Eurofighter, A400M and MRTT) using a unified Python framework.

highlights.label: ANALYTICS LEADERSHIP
highlights.text: Appointed Service Analytics Plateau (SeAP) focal point after integrating department data into corporate dashboards, driving bi-directional analytics synergies.
